/:username.GET: RETURNS USER BY USERNAME INPUT - STRING VALUES ONLY

/topics.GET: RETURNS AN ARRAY OF TOPIC OBJECTS

/articles.GET: RETURNS AN ARRAY OF ALL ARTICLES. SORT_BY, ORDER CAN BE USED AS QUERIES TO SORT ARTICLES BY A SPECIFIC COLUMN OR BY DATE ASCENDING/DESCENDING RESPECTIVELY. AUTHOR AND TOPIC QUERIES ARE ALSO PERMITTED TO FILTER ARTICLES.
